post.description: Request via this endpoint the creation of a deposit address for a currency you intend to deposit.

memo.description: Address remark. If thereâ€™s no remark, it is empty. When you withdraw from other platforms to KuCoin, you need to fill in memo(tag). Be careful: If you do not fill in memo(tag), your deposit may not be available.

to.description: Deposit account type: MAIN (funding account), TRADE (spot trading account)

expirationDate.description: Expiration time; Lightning network expiration time; this field is not applicable to non-Lightning networks

post.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint the creation of a deposit address for a currency you intend to deposit.

chain.description: The currency chainId, e.g. the available values for USDT are OMNI, ERC20, and TRC20; default is ERC20. The available values for BTC are Native, Segwit, TRC20; the parameters are bech32, btc, trx; default is Native.

to.description: Deposit account type: MAIN (funding account), TRADE (spot trading account); the default is MAIN

amount.description: Deposit amount. This parameter is only used when applying for invoices on the Lightning Network. This parameter is invalid if it is not passed through the Lightning Network.

get.description: Get all deposit addresses for the currency you intend to deposit. If the returned data is empty, you may need to add the deposit address first.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Deposit amount. This parameter is only used when applying for invoices on the Lightning Network. This parameter is invalid if it is not passed through the Lightning Network.

memo.description: Address remark. If thereâ€™s no remark, it is empty. When you withdraw from other platforms to KuCoin, you need to fill in memo(tag). Be careful: If you do not fill in memo(tag), your deposit may not be available.

to.description: Deposit account type: MAIN (funding account), TRADE (spot trading account)

expirationDate.description: Expiration time; Lightning network expiration time; this field is not applicable to non-Lightning networks

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get all deposit addresses for the currency you intend to deposit. If the returned data is empty, you may need to add the deposit address first.

get.description: Request a deposit list via this endpoint. Items are paginated and sorted to show the latest first. See the Pagination section for retrieving additional entries after the first page.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status. Available value: PROCESSING, SUCCESS, and FAILURE

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results per request. Minimum is 10, maximum is 500.

memo.description: Address remark. If thereâ€™s no remark, it is empty.

updatedAt.description: Update time of the database record

arrears.description: Whether there is any debt.A quick rollback will cause the deposit to fail. If the deposit fails, you will need to repay the balance.

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request a deposit list via this endpoint. Items are paginated and sorted to show the latest first. See the Pagination section for retrieving additional entries after the first page.
get.x-response-example:
{
    "code": "200000",
    "data": {
        "currentPage": 1,
        "pageSize": 50,
        "totalNum": 5,
        "totalPage": 1,
        "items": [
            {
                "currency": "USDT",
                "chain": "",
                "status": "SUCCESS",
                "address": "a435*****@gmail.com",
                "memo": "",
                "isInner": true,
                "amount": "1.00000000",
                "fee": "0.00000000",
                "walletTxId": null,
                "createdAt": 1728555875000,
                "updatedAt": 1728555875000,
                "remark": "",
                "arrears": false
            },
            {
                "currency": "USDT",
                "chain": "trx",
                "status": "SUCCESS",
                "address": "TSv3L1fS7******X4nLP6rqNxYz",
                "memo": "",
                "isInner": true,
                "amount": "6.00000000",
                "fee": "0.00000000",
                "walletTxId": null,
                "createdAt": 1721730920000,
                "updatedAt": 1721730920000,
                "remark": "",
                "arrears": false
            }
        ]
    }
}

get.description: Get all deposit addresses for the currency you intend to deposit. If the returned data is empty, you may need to add the deposit address first.

memo.description: Address remark. If thereâ€™s no remark, it is empty. When you withdraw from other platforms to KuCoin, you need to fill in memo(tag). Be careful: If you do not fill in memo(tag), your deposit may not be available.

to.description: Deposit account type: main (funding account), trade (spot trading account)

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get all deposit addresses for the currency you intend to deposit. If the returned data is empty, you may need to add the deposit address first.

get.description: Get all deposit addresses for the currency you intend to deposit. If the returned data is empty, you may need to add the deposit address first.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: The chainId of currency, e.g. the available values for USDT are OMNI, ERC20, and TRC20; default is ERC20. The available values for BTC are Native, Segwit, TRC20; the parameters are bech32, btc, trx; default is Native. This only applies to multi-chain currencies; no need for single-chain currencies.

memo.description: Address remark. If thereâ€™s no remark, it is empty. When you withdraw from other platforms to KuCoin, you need to fill in memo(tag). Be careful: If you do not fill in memo(tag), your deposit may not be available.

to.description: Deposit account type: main (funding account), trade (spot trading account)

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get all deposit addresses for the currency you intend to deposit. If the returned data is empty, you may need to add the deposit address first.

post.description: Request via this endpoint the creation of a deposit address for a currency you intend to deposit.

memo.description: Address remark. If thereâ€™s no remark, it is empty. When you withdraw from other platforms to KuCoin, you need to fill in memo(tag). Be careful: If you do not fill in memo(tag), your deposit may not be available.

to.description: Deposit account type: main (funding account), trade (spot trading account)

post.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint the creation of a deposit address for a currency you intend to deposit.

chain.description: The chainId of currency, e.g. the available values for USDT are OMNI, ERC20, and TRC20; default is ERC20. The available values for BTC are Native, Segwit, TRC20; the parameters are bech32, btc, trx; default is Native. This only applies to multi-chain currencies; no need for single-chain currencies.

to.description: Deposit account type: main (funding account), trade (spot trading account); the default is main

get.description: Request the V1 historical deposits list on KuCoin via this endpoint. The return value is the data after Pagination, sorted in descending order according to time.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status. Available value: PROCESSING, SUCCESS, and FAILURE

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request the V1 historical deposits list on KuCoin via this endpoint. The return value is the data after Pagination, sorted in descending order according to time.
